clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Crizanlizumab is indicated to reduce the frequency of vaso occlusive crisis in patients with sickle cell diseases who are 16 years old L10097

contraindications.disease: Data regarding the toxicity of crizanlizumab is not readily available L10097
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Crizanlizumab is a P selectin inhibitor that prevents interactions between endothelial cells platelets red blood cells and leukocytes L10097 It has a long duration of action as it is given every 4 weeks L10097 Patients should be counselled regarding the risk of infusion reactions as well as crizanlizumab s interference with platelet counts using EDTA tubes L10097
